info:
Move vessel 50m away from pipe for ROV dive.

If only background comp vessel can stay.

Rov move 30m from pipe and 20m from Vessel.

Check whatever needs to be on pre-dive is on.
Spint 
C-node
Mini IPS
Apos etc

Restart driver when off deck. Check settings
Pressure 1.02
Check if ROV or WInch is set

Check and Power on everything
SVX2
MINISVS
CP
Laser
TSS power
TSS serial
ORCA cameras
Both R2Sonic
Check system parameters is correct with Cable excel

Background comp every 3 max 4 hours

Every cable change

Or if good opportunity while downtime like loss of autotrack
Check qinsy grid is correct with correct filename

Check in session setup -> additional mainlines
Select correct KP ref as the line being run

Check folder setup for SubC.
Record local in I drive.
Transfer to Fleet when logged off.. only what has not already been transferred.

Sort by name is easiest.
Each line has its own folder so check its correct.

desc: Autolog setup( op. zone dive etc.)
info:
Check operators is correct.
No hidden error message.
Log is working properly.
Correct Dive number and area etc.
Final quick glance and check with collague all is ready?
